text: Japanese literature is literature written in the Japanese language. Early Japanese literature was a lot like Chinese literature because Japan and China had a lot of contact. Over time, Japanese literature became a new style that was different from Chinese literature. == Female authors == Female authors were successful during the Heian period. When the Imperial Court became less powerful, female authors were less successful. ==Related pages== *Basho *Japan studies *The Tale of Genji *Yasunari Kawabata *Yukio Mishima *Shusaku Endo *Pillow book *Haiku *Kenzaburo Oe *Natsume Soseki
title: Japanese literature
